node.excerpt:
I didn’t open myself up just

for you to crawl in and die.

I am no field for you to haunt

This is no place for a final stand.


Sometimes…

In cauterizing all these wounds,

I’ve burned myself alive.


In cauterizing all these words,

there’s no page left to write on.

The ink…

Just because there is suffering in art,

doesn’t mean there is art in suffering.


I see it with disturbing frequency: pain framed as…

You tender thing.

The thread spools between your teeth.

For all the binding to hold me in place,

it’s you who’s deliciously bound.


You…

Passion is not mastery,

Strong feelings are

neither facts nor keen understanding.
 Our convictions take courage,

to swim against the…

eve
Your blurring is as sudden,

as constant as the breath of dawn.

Between us stretch vast chasms,

silent voids where echoes falter…

We all know that art is not truth. Art is a lie that makes us realize truth,
at least the truth that is given us to understand. The artist…
